# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O common-tosca-catalog-1.0.0-RC1-linux64.tar.gz https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1068/org/openo/common-tosca/catalog/catalog-all/1.0.0-RC1/catalog-all-1.0.0-RC1-linux64.tar.gz && tar -xf common-tosca-catalog-1.0.0-RC1-linux64.tar.gz && rm -f common-tosca-catalog-1.0.0-RC1-linux64.tar.gz
EXPOSE 8200
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC1 autorelease-1068 > VERSION
